entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
